 28namespace vsip

 30
 31template <template <typename, typename> class View,
 32	  typename                            T,
 33	  typename                            Block>
 34struct ViewConversion;
 35
 36namespace impl
 37{
 38
 39template <template <typename, typename> class View,
 40	  typename                            T,
 41	  typename                            Block>
 42View<T, typename Distributed_local_block<Block>::type>
 43get_local_view(View<T, Block> v);
 44
 45/// Template class to help instantiate a view of a given dimension.
 46template <dimension_type Dim,
 47	  typename       T,
 48	  typename       Block>
 49struct View_of_dim;
 50
 51/// Trait that provides typedef 'type' iff VIEW is a valid view.
 52///
 53/// Views should provide specializations similar to:
 54///    template <> struct Is_view_type<Matrix>       { typedef void type; };
 55///    template <> struct Is_view_type<const_Matrix> { typedef void type; };
 56template <typename> struct Is_view_type { static bool const value = false;};
 57
 58
 59/// Trait that provides typedef 'type' iff VIEW is a valid const view.
 60template <typename> struct Is_const_view_type
 61{ static bool const value = false;};
 62
 63/// Trait that provides typedef 'type' iff VIEW is a valid lazy view.
 64template <typename> struct Is_lazy_view_type
 65{ static bool const value = false;};
 66
 67// Dim_of_view<V>
 68
 69template <template <typename,typename> class View> 
 70            struct Dim_of_view;
 71
 72template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::Vector>
 73  { static const dimension_type dim = 1; };
 74
 75template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::Matrix>
 76  { static const dimension_type dim = 2; };
 77
 78template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::Tensor> 
 79  { static const dimension_type dim = 3; };
 80
 81template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::const_Vector>
 82  { static const dimension_type dim = 1; };
 83
 84template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::const_Matrix>
 85  { static const dimension_type dim = 2; };
 86
 87template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::const_Tensor> 
 88  { static const dimension_type dim = 3; };
 89
 90template <> struct Dim_of_view<lazy_Vector>
 91  { static const dimension_type dim = 1; };
 92
 93template <> struct Dim_of_view<lazy_Matrix>
 94  { static const dimension_type dim = 2; };
 95
 96template <> struct Dim_of_view<lazy_Tensor> 
 97  { static const dimension_type dim = 3; };
 98
 99
100// Const_of_view<V,B>
101
102template <template <typename,typename> class View, typename Block> 
103                          struct Const_of_view;
104
105template <typename Block> struct Const_of_view<vsip::Vector,Block>
106  { typedef vsip::const_Vector<typename Block::value_type,Block> view_type; };
107
108template <typename Block> struct Const_of_view<vsip::Matrix,Block>
109  { typedef vsip::const_Matrix<typename Block::value_type,Block> view_type; };
110
111template <typename Block> struct Const_of_view<vsip::Tensor,Block> 
112  { typedef vsip::const_Tensor<typename Block::value_type,Block> view_type; };
113
114// Lazy_of_view<V,B>
115
116template <template <typename,typename> class View, typename Block> 
117struct lazy_of_view;
118
119template <typename Block> struct lazy_of_view<vsip::Vector, Block>
120{ typedef lazy_Vector<typename Block::value_type, Block> type;};
121
122template <typename Block> struct lazy_of_view<vsip::const_Vector, Block>
123{ typedef lazy_Vector<typename Block::value_type, Block> type;};
124
125template <typename Block> struct lazy_of_view<vsip::Matrix, Block>
126{ typedef lazy_Matrix<typename Block::value_type, Block> type;};
127
128template <typename Block> struct lazy_of_view<vsip::const_Matrix, Block>
129{ typedef lazy_Matrix<typename Block::value_type, Block> type;};
130
131template <typename Block> struct lazy_of_view<vsip::Tensor,Block> 
132{ typedef lazy_Tensor<typename Block::value_type, Block> type;};
133
134template <typename Block> struct lazy_of_view<vsip::const_Tensor,Block> 
135{ typedef lazy_Tensor<typename Block::value_type, Block> type;};
136
137} // namespace impl
138
139template <template <typename,typename> class View,
140	  typename Block, typename T = typename Block::value_type,
141	  dimension_type Dim = impl::Dim_of_view<View>::dim >
142struct impl_const_View
143{ 
144  static const bool impl_is_view = true;
145  typedef View<T,Block> impl_vsip_view_type;
146  typedef impl_const_View impl_const_view_type;
147  typedef typename impl::View_block_storage<Block>::type impl_storage_type;
148
149  // Types for local views of distributed objects.
150  typedef typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type
151		 impl_localblock_type;
152  typedef View<T, impl_localblock_type> local_type;
153    
154  impl_const_View(Block* blk)
155    : impl_blk(blk) {}
156  impl_const_View(Block* blk, impl::noincrement_type)
157    : impl_blk(blk,impl::noincrement) {}
158
159  View<T,Block>& impl_view()
160    { return static_cast<View<T,Block>&>(*this); }
161  View<T,Block> const& impl_view() const
162    { return static_cast<View<T,Block> const&>(*this); }
163
164  // [view.vector.accessors]
165  // [view.matrix.accessors]
166  // [view.tensor.accessors]
167  Block& block() const VSIP_NOTHROW
168    { return *this->impl_blk; }
169  vsip::length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
170    { return this->impl_blk->size(); }
171  vsip::length_type size(vsip::dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
172    { return this->impl_blk->size(Dim, d); }
173
174  // [parview.vector.accessors]
175  local_type local() const VSIP_NOTHROW
176    { return vsip::impl::get_local_view(this->impl_view()); }
177
178protected:
179   impl_storage_type impl_blk;
180};
181
182// specialize for element type std::complex<T>
183
184template <template <typename,typename> class View,
185	  typename Block, typename T, dimension_type Dim>
186struct impl_const_View<View,Block,std::complex<T>,Dim>
187{ 
188  static const bool impl_is_view = true;
189  typedef View<std::complex<T>,Block> impl_vsip_view_type;
190  typedef impl_const_View impl_const_view_type;
191  typedef typename impl::View_block_storage<Block>::type impl_storage_type;
192
193  // Types for local views of distributed objects.
194  typedef typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type
195		 impl_localblock_type;
196  typedef View<std::complex<T>, impl_localblock_type> local_type;
197
198  typedef impl::Component_block<Block,impl::Real_extractor>
199    impl_rblock_type;
200  typedef impl::Component_block<Block,impl::Imag_extractor>
201    impl_iblock_type;
202  typedef T impl_scalar_type;
203
204  typedef View<T,impl_rblock_type> realview_type;
205  typedef View<T,impl_iblock_type> imagview_type;
206  typedef View<T,impl_rblock_type> const_realview_type;
207  typedef View<T,impl_iblock_type> const_imagview_type;
208
209  impl_const_View(Block* blk)
210    : impl_blk(blk) {}
211  impl_const_View(Block* blk, impl::noincrement_type)
212    : impl_blk(blk,impl::noincrement) {}
213
214  const_realview_type real() const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
215  {
216    impl_rblock_type block(*this->impl_blk);
217    return const_realview_type(block);
218  }
219  const_imagview_type imag() const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
220  {
221    impl_iblock_type block(*this->impl_blk);
222    return const_imagview_type(block);
223  }
224
225  View<std::complex<T>,Block>& impl_view()
226    { return static_cast<View<std::complex<T>,Block>&>(*this); }
227  View<std::complex<T>,Block> const& impl_view() const
228    { return static_cast<View<std::complex<T>,Block> const&>(*this); }
229
230  // [view.vector.accessors]
231  // [view.matrix.accessors]
232  // [view.tensor.accessors]
233  Block& block() const VSIP_NOTHROW
234    { return *this->impl_blk; }
235  vsip::length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
236    { return this->impl_blk->size(); }
237  vsip::length_type size(vsip::dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
238    { return this->impl_blk->size(Dim, d); }
239
240  // [parview.vector.accessors]
241  local_type local() const VSIP_NOTHROW
242    { return vsip::impl::get_local_view(this->impl_view()); }
243
244protected:
245   impl_storage_type impl_blk;
246};
247
248namespace impl
249{
250  enum disambiguator_type { disambiguate }; 
251}
252
253template <template <typename,typename> class View,
254	  typename Block, typename T = typename Block::value_type,
255	  dimension_type Dim = impl::Dim_of_view<View>::dim>
256struct impl_View : impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type
257{ 
258  static const bool impl_is_nonconst_view = true;
259  typedef View<T,Block> impl_vsip_view_type;
260  typedef typename impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type impl_base_type;
261  typedef typename Block::map_type impl_map_type;
262  typedef typename
263    impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type::impl_const_view_type
264      impl_const_view_type;
265
266  // Types for local views of distributed objects.
267  typedef typename impl_base_type::impl_localblock_type impl_localblock_type;
268  typedef View<T, impl_localblock_type> local_type;
269
270  impl_View(length_type len, T const& value,
271       impl_map_type const& map, impl::disambiguator_type)
272    : impl_base_type(len, value, map) {}
273  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, T const& value,
274       impl_map_type const& map, impl::disambiguator_type)
275    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, value, map) {}
276  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, length_type len3,
277       T const& value, impl_map_type const& map, impl::disambiguator_type)
278    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, len3, value, map) {}
279  impl_View(length_type len, impl_map_type const& map)
280    : impl_base_type(len, map) {}
281  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, impl_map_type const& map)
282    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, map) {}
283  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, length_type len3,
284       impl_map_type const& map)
285    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, len3, map) {}
286  explicit impl_View(Block& blk) VSIP_NOTHROW
287    : impl_base_type(blk) {}
288  impl_View(impl_View const& v) VSIP_NOTHROW
289    : impl_base_type(v.block()) {}
290
291  View<T,Block>& impl_view() { return static_cast<View<T,Block>&>(*this); }
292  View<T,Block> const& impl_view() const
293    { return static_cast<View<T,Block> const&>(*this); }
294
295  // [parview.vector.accessors]
296  local_type local() const VSIP_NOTHROW
297    { return vsip::impl::get_local_view(this->impl_view()); }
298};
299
300// specialize for element type std::complex<T>
301
302template <template <typename,typename> class View,
303	  typename Block, typename T, dimension_type Dim>
304struct impl_View<View,Block,std::complex<T>,Dim>
305  : impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type
306{ 
307  static const bool impl_is_nonconst_view = true;
308  typedef View<std::complex<T>,Block> impl_vsip_view_type;
309  typedef typename
310    impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type::impl_const_view_type
311      impl_const_view_type;
312  typedef typename impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type impl_base_type;
313  typedef typename Block::map_type impl_map_type;
314
315  // Types for local views of distributed objects.
316  typedef typename impl_base_type::impl_localblock_type impl_localblock_type;
317  typedef View<std::complex<T>, impl_localblock_type> local_type;
318
319  typedef impl::Component_block<Block,impl::Real_extractor> impl_rblock_type;
320  typedef impl::Component_block<Block,impl::Imag_extractor> impl_iblock_type;
321  typedef T impl_scalar_type;
322
323  // complex
324  typedef typename impl::Const_of_view<View,impl_rblock_type>::view_type
325    const_realview_type;
326  typedef typename impl::Const_of_view<View,impl_iblock_type>::view_type 
327    const_imagview_type;
328  typedef View<T,impl_rblock_type> realview_type;
329  typedef View<T,impl_iblock_type> imagview_type;
330
331  impl_View(length_type len, std::complex<T> const& value,
332       impl_map_type const& map, impl::disambiguator_type)
333    : impl_base_type(len, value, map) {}
334  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, std::complex<T> const& value,
335       impl_map_type const& map, impl::disambiguator_type)
336    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, value, map) {}
337  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, length_type len3,
338      std::complex<T> const& value, impl_map_type const& map,
339      impl::disambiguator_type)
340    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, len3, value, map) {}
341  impl_View(length_type len, impl_map_type const& map)
342    : impl_base_type(len, map) {}
343  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, impl_map_type const& map)
344    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, map) {}
345  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, length_type len3,
346       impl_map_type const& map)
347    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, len3, map) {}
348  explicit impl_View(Block& blk) VSIP_NOTHROW
349    : impl_base_type(blk) {}
350  impl_View(impl_View const& v) VSIP_NOTHROW
351    : impl_base_type(v.block()) {}
352  const_realview_type real() const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
353    { return this->impl_const_view_type::real(); }
354  realview_type real() VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
355  {
356    impl_rblock_type block(this->block());
357    return realview_type(block);
358  }
359  const_imagview_type imag() const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
360    { return this->impl_const_view_type::imag(); }
361  imagview_type imag() VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
362  {
363    impl_iblock_type block(this->block());
364    return imagview_type(block);
365  }
366
367  View<std::complex<T>,Block>& impl_view()
368    { return static_cast<View<std::complex<T>,Block>&>(*this); }
369  View<std::complex<T>,Block> const& impl_view() const
370    { return static_cast<View<std::complex<T>,Block> const&>(*this); }
371
372  // [parview.vector.accessors]
373  local_type local() const VSIP_NOTHROW
374    { return vsip::impl::get_local_view(this->impl_view()); }
375};
376
377} // namespace vsip
